page.title: 13Mannington Sub Station
page.content: met by the amount pouring along it, otherwise _ power cut, some users may have to be switched off. At Mannington 5 men are employed but only 1 man works at a time. There are six arms on each tower.One arm attracts the lightning to itself but not to the others. Occasionally lightning hits the other arms. Mannington has 2 radio networks and 1 private telephone as a form of communication,it also has it's own radio system so no_one else can hear Fawley is one example of the stations which feed electricity to Mannington. Mannington takes electricity from the Super Grid System and transforms it down to lower voltages for smaller Sub Stations which then sends the electricity to the homes and factories
